The one who AFKs. Not surrendering =/= toxic.

Get outta here with this.

It's pretty clear by the setup. If 70% of your team agrees to surrender, you surrender. Riot approved in most situations. (Things like 4-man premades forcing surrender to troll 5th player can get you banned. But this is generally okay.)

If the surrender fails, that means your team did not agree to surrender, and you're expected to keep playing. If the game wanted to allow you to quit, it would *actually* allow you to quit at any time, rather than requiring your teammates' agreement.

Person who afks is the troll. I would gladly report that kind of person.
I never like surrendering unless its a normal game - then thats okay. If its a rank game, there shouldnt be any surrendering. Regardless of the game mode, you keep playing until the end. Even if theres a fed enemy or a lane lost, people need to keep putting in effort. Ive been in games where the beginning was rough but eventually ended with a victory.
